title: MUNDO'S Q IS BUGGED
body: when mundo throws his q, it is always invisible, so its hard for people to dodge it. This gives any mundo player that much of an advantage. I am not sure if this goes with all his skins, but i have only seen it happen on his default skin. It's not just it goes invisible every now and then, it's always invisible :P please fix.

replies.body:
I once had Mundo Literally go where he pleased.
He walked right through my Azir Ultimate and gave no fucks.

I haven't seen any invisible cleavers lately.

I wonder why?

> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RA1jL7so,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-06-05T00:49:51.668+0000)
>
> I haven't seen any invisible cleavers lately.
> 
> I wonder why?

Is that because its invisible? :)

You raise a few good points in that argument. 
Just let me remind you that if the mound throws an invisible cleaver, which you can not see, do you know his throwing a cleaver or is it just him waving forwards? Invisible or non existent, that is the question.

Well, I get your point, but I must argue that if the Baron is up 30 seconds before the blue buff then it is in fact a wave forward. However, the fact that Master Yi was executed by the fountain 1 minute before the red buff was taken by the Xerath with the Thormail,  then I must say that the cleavers are indeed invisible.
Case of the invisible cleavers closed

ggwp

Nice debating with you sir xD
Uninstall and reinstall.. It happened to the nidalee spears and apparently the only fix was to reinstall
i played a game with executioner mundo and they dodged many a cleaver. so might just be his default
